nodes.text: Asuin was a frost-covered planet located in Hutt Space that was populated by wampas. Whilst the surface was besieged by icestorms, there were underground caverns filled with lava.

During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic dispatched Jedi General's Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker with the task of recovering the stolen location of a Separatist hypermatter generators. The plans were present within a 3PO-series protocol droid known as J-3PO. The two Jedi managed to find the droid in the underground caverns but it was destroyed by the Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress.
